These are requirements issues that are resolved through iteration of the System/Software Requirements Definition process. It is also important that the architecture addresses key stakeholder concerns since not all of these will be captured in requirements. 3) Allocate concepts, properties, characteristics, behaviors, functions, or constraints that are significant to architecture decisions of the software system to architectural entities.
